short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks your network usage and translates it into your carbon footprint for the current chrome session (values are approximate).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Locally tracks your network usage and translates it into your carbon footprint for the current chrome session (values are approximate). This is for educational purposes, for wider understanding on how visiting a website can cause a carbon emission.

To go more indepth on how emissions can be calculated please follow the link below: https://sustainablewebdesign.org/estimating-digital-emissions/
